Notes

Celestite is an instrumental companion to, and expands upon dimensions hidden within the universe of [m=371727]. This clear (completely transparent) vinyl edition is limited to a first pressing of 1000. Includes download card for the full album from Midheaven Mailorder. Records are housed in a heavyweight Stoughton tip-on gatefold sleeve and includes two full color printed inner sleeves.
